document.full_text: ebay inc's efforts to make its marketplaces more appealing to online shoppers paid off in the first quarter as more people bought items on its auction site, and its paypal payment system was used by more merchants.
document.title: ebay forecast pleases as paypal, auctions gain users
lines_and_colors: ebay inc's efforts to make its marketplaces more appealing to online shoppers paid off in the first quarter as more people bought items on its auction site, and its paypal payment system was used by more merchants.
